name: Dicetopian
description:
The cyberpunk future isn't what we hoped it would be. Everything in your home is Pay-Per-Use™, and the value of money fluctuates wildly every second. So keep your spirits up, go to work, and spend your C-UbikCoin© wisely. You might make it through another week without starving, or losing it.

HOW TO PLAY

Switch on the light to start the day.

Click devices in your apartment to spend a dice trying to use it. 

Keep your hunger level satisfied with the food dispensing items. Mood affects your productivity at work, keep that up for more dice after a work shift. 

Make it to the end of the week with a good mood.

Hold ESC for 5 seconds to quit.

All assets were created within 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.

TEAM

Programming: Rafał Piechnik,  Kostiantyn Kravchyshyn

3D Objects, Environment & Textures: Aarati

Music & Sound: Adam Saunders
